title: Rogue Legacy Save Editor
description:
Files:
Boost.exe - the editor
source.cs - source code
README.txt

Instructions:
Move Boost.exe to your Rogue Legacy savegame folder.
For me it's C:UserUsernameDocumentsSavedGamesRogueLegacyRogueLegacyStorageContainerAllPlayers

I'd recommend making a backup copy of all of the .rcdat files in that folder, just incase something goes wrong.

Run Boost.exe


Other:
Note that I only created and tested this program for version 1.0.9 and I have no idea if it will work for other versions.

Anyone interested in editing rogue legacy savegames will find the following documentation useful: http://rogue-legacy.wikia.com/wiki/Save_Games
